overlay.name: berkano
overlay.description: Berkano overlay provides an overlay for Gentoo Linux with ebuilds of bleeding edge software (such as live subversion builds) and other handy tools that are missing from the official portage tree. Areas of interest include multimedia and system administration.

overlay.name: crg

overlay.description: A collection of ebuilds related to the D programming language.

overlay.name: efika
overlay.description: Temporary overlay for adding support for the EFIKA platform to Gentoo.

overlay.name: emacs
overlay.description: Provide Emacs related ebuilds which are a bit experimental or work-in-progress. Don't rely on them, but don't hesitate to file bugs or write emails.

overlay.name: enlightenment
overlay.description: Support for the Enlightenment project, most notably DR17/e17.

overlay.name: falco
overlay.description: Falco's random stuff about netmon, net-mail or security, unofficial ebuilds like proxsmtp, unofficial patches on Postfix; also pre-stable security upgrades, perhaps merged in the Security Overlay Project some day.

overlay.name: finnish
overlay.description: Finnish overlay for spell checking etc. etc.

overlay.description: Flameeyes' private developer overlay

overlay.name: freevo
overlay.description: The Freevo overlay provides ebuils for development snapshots of the unreleased Freevo 2.0 and its dependencies.

overlay.name: gamerlay
overlay.description: Gamers overlay for all various games. Not related with games team.

overlay.name: gcc-porting

overlay.name: initng
overlay.description: Initng is a full replacement of the old and in many ways deprecated sysvinit tool. It is designed with speed in mind because it does as much as possible asynchronously. In other words: It will boot your unix-system much faster, and give you more control and statistics over your system.

overlay.name: interactive-fiction
overlay.description: Packages for players and authors of interactive fiction

overlay.name: iwlwifi
overlay.description: This overlay provides ebuilds for the new wireless driver iwlwifi

overlay.name: java-overlay
overlay.description: The only java overlay available via layman. This overlays contains ebuilds that are expected to work when you emerge them. The ebuilds also need to use the generation 2 eclasses.

overlay.name: je_fro
overlay.description: Helpful ebuilds for the macbook pro, and experimental gentoo-science packages.

overlay.name: jmbsvicetto
overlay.description: Jorge Manuel B. S. Vicetto developer overlay

overlay.name: jokey
overlay.description: Jokey's Overlay - Contains pre-tree stuff like italc, pkgcore-test-ebuilds and lcd stuff

overlay.name: jyujin
overlay.description: eINIT, kyuuba, dev9, various splash daemons

overlay.name: kde-testing
overlay.description: Official KDE team's testing overlay.

overlay.name: kde3
overlay.description: Official KDE team's KDE3 sunset overlay.

overlay.name: kerberos
overlay.description: Overlay which provides the bleeding edge on the kerberos integration in gentoo.

overlay.name: kolab
overlay.description: Project to allow running Kolab on Gentoo.

overlay.name: kvm
overlay.description: Kernel Virtual Machine userspace support

overlay.name: leio
overlay.description: Mart Raudsepp developer overlay

overlay.name: lila-theme
overlay.description: The Lila theme is a community project, originally created by Daniel G. Taylor and members of the Gentoo Linux community. The theme is based around SVG graphics - which means they can be scaled to any size without loss of quality - and is meant to be usable across different desktops and platforms. For more information about the Lila theme project or to see how you could get involved, there are a few places to look: The Lila theme forums #lila on chat.freenode.org

overlay.name: liquidx
overlay.description: Development overlay for ebuilds that I plan to commit to the tree that are sourced from bugzilla or liquidx.

overlay.name: lisp
overlay.description: Common Lisp/Scheme development, recruitment and live overlay. Support and feedback in `#gentoo-lisp' and via `gentoo-lisp@gentoo.org'.

overlay.name: mpd
overlay.description: The experimental gentoo overlay was designed as a way to keep up-to-date. Most of it are live ebuilds, ebuilds that pull the latest HEAD from whatever repository. It also includes ebuilds for clients that are not yet in portage. It is maintained by avuton, send new ebuilds, corrections or bugs directly to him.

overlay.description: Development overlay for PostgreSQL, testing branch.

overlay.name: powerpc

overlay.name: pro-audio

overlay.name: pure-funtoo
overlay.description: Gentoo overlay with Funtoo-only ebuilds extracted from Funtoo tree

overlay.name: python
overlay.description: Python overlay.

overlay.name: pythonhead
overlay.description: Mostly Python-related ebuilds.

overlay.name: qting-edge
overlay.description: Experimental Qt4 ebuilds and related packages, provided by Gentoo's Qt team. The overlay contains ebuilds for official pre-releases, and live ebuilds for both the official Nokia Qt Software git repository and KDE's qt-copy subversion repository. It also has various (non-KDE) packages that use Qt4.

overlay.description: Experimental ebuilds from the Ruby edge.

overlay.name: s3d
overlay.description: Gentoo ebuilds for s3d and related packages. s3d is a 3d network display server which can be used as 3d desktop enviroment.

overlay.name: sabayon
overlay.description: Purpose To provide ebuilds that were created from the Sabayon Linux project such as customized programs, ebuilds not in the official portage, artwork, themes, etc. Bugs to http://bugs.sabayonlinux.org/bugs/

overlay.name: scarabeus
overlay.description: Tomas Chvatal developer overlay

overlay.name: science
overlay.description: The Gentoo Science Overlay is intended as a place to work outside of the main portage tree on experimental ebuilds. Our aim is to increase the rate of development of scientific packages for Gentoo, but ebuilds in this repository are by their very nature more experimental. If you wish to use them you should be willing to help test and report bugs.

overlay.description: Matsuu's Second Life Overlay

overlay.name: sipx

overlay.description: Gentoo ebuild overlay with misc stuff that I find interesting.

overlay.description: Overlay of tante

overlay.description: Tcl/Tk 8.8, Itcl/Itk 4 (beta) and other fixed packages

overlay.name: THE

overlay.name: thousand-parsec
overlay.description: Overlay for the Thousand Parsec framework for turn-based space empire building games.

overlay.name: toolchain
overlay.description: Toolchain ebuilds that are unsuitable for the tree. Snapshots, unstable versions, etc...

overlay.name: trapni
overlay.description: trapni's private developer overlay (mostly covering YaCS/server related ebuilds for now)

overlay.name: vdr-devel
overlay.description: Overlay for VDR, that contains ebuilds for development version of VDR, and specific plugins for that version.

overlay.name: vdr-experimental
overlay.description: Development overlay for VDR, experimental branch. WARNING: This branch can kill your VDR! Only use it if you know what you are doing. It is best to stay in touch with the developers if you would like to try this out. We are available in #gentoo-vdr on Freenode.

overlay.name: vdr-testing
overlay.description: Development overlay for VDR, testing branch.

overlay.name: vdr-xine
overlay.description: Overlay for VDR, that contains ebuilds for the vdr-xine output plugin, and the needed patched xine-lib

overlay.name: verlihub
overlay.description: Verlihub is a Direct Connect protocol server runs on Linux OS written in C++; Many features are available: MySQL database, very low use of CPU, RAM and Bandwidth, deflood integrated protection, plugins

overlay.name: vmware
overlay.description: Testing ground for vmware-server and vmware-server-console ebuilds until they can eventually be committed into portage.

overlay.name: voip
overlay.description: Voice over IP related ebuilds.

overlay.name: voyageur
overlay.description: Voyageur's random ebuilds stuff

overlay.name: vps
overlay.description: Gentoo VPS project overlay (experimental ebuilds)

overlay.name: webapps-experimental
overlay.description: This is the home of Gentoo's wider collection of ebuilds for web-based applications. This is where we collect all the ebuilds submitted to Bugzilla by our users, and make them available in an easy-to-use overlay for wider testing.

overlay.description: wired's testing grounds and bleeding edge ebuilds
